quote.ko: Sticks elevates brands to global success, while preserving key regional nuances.
quote.en: Sticks elevates brands to global success, while preserving key regional nuances.

quote.ko: 해외의 감도와 한국적 맥락을 모두 이해하는, 보기 드문 감각의 팀입니다.
quote.en: A rare team that understands both global sensibility and Korean context.

quote.ko: Detailed, precise word choices. I knew we met the right partner.
quote.en: Detailed, precise word choices. I knew we met the right partner.

quote.ko: 브랜드를 이해하는 실력과 매력적으로 표현하는 센스를 겸비한 팀
quote.en: A team that combines brand expertise with a talent for compelling expression.

quote.ko: Working with Sticks & Stones always adds excitement to every project!
quote.en: Working with Sticks & Stones always adds excitement to every project!

quote.ko: 각 나라마다의 독특한 문화코드를 심어 클라이언트의 사업을 성공으로 이끕니다.
quote.en: They embed unique cultural codes of each country to lead clients to success.

quote.ko: A rare team with creative sensibility fluent in global style, yet grounded in Korean insight.
quote.en: A rare team with creative sensibility fluent in global style, yet grounded in Korean insight.

quote.ko: 단어의 작은 뉘앙스 차이조차 놓치지 않는 섬세함. 일하는 내내 좋은 파트너를 만났다는 즐거움을 느끼게 해주었습니다.
quote.en: Their attention to even the smallest nuances in words made me feel throughout that we had found the right partner.

quote.ko: 클라이언트의 고민을 다각도로 점검해주셔서 내부 설득에 큰 도움이 되었어요.
quote.en: Their multi-angle analysis of our challenges was a huge help in getting internal buy-in.
Working with Sticks & Stones is always a joy!

quote.ko: 세심한 제안과 열정적 지원으로, 프로젝트 내내 든든한 파트너십을 느낄 수 있었습니다.
quote.en: Their thoughtful proposals and passionate support made us feel a solid partnership throughout.

quote.ko: A team that pairs brand insight with an instinct for magnetic expression.
quote.en: A team that pairs brand insight with an instinct for magnetic expression.

quote.ko: 프로젝트 기간 내내 문제를 함께 고민하고 해결하려는 열정과 파트너십에 감명 받았습니다.
quote.en: I was impressed by their passion and partnership in tackling problems together throughout the project.

quote.ko: Detail까지 챙겨주시는 세심함과 Customized Solution을 제시해 주시는 완벽함.
quote.en: Meticulous attention to detail and perfectly customized solutions.

quote.ko: Sticks & Stones' multi-angle analysis of client challenges was a huge help in getting internal approval.
quote.en: Sticks & Stones' multi-angle analysis of client challenges was a huge help in getting internal approval.
